mapper.select: select q_no, title, content, thumbnail, userid, hit, answer, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from qnaboard
mapper.insert: insert into qnaboard (q_no, title, content, userid, thumbnail, hit, answer, writedate) values(qna_sq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{userid}, #{thumbnail}, 0, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: select a.q_no, a.title, a.content, a.userid, a.hit, a.answer, to_char(a.writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate, b.m_pic from qnaboard a join register b on a.userid = b.userid where q_no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update qnaboard set hit=hit+1 where q_no=#{param1}
mapper.select: select userid from qnaboard where q_no=#{param1}
